text: For the HubSpot CRM Search API, are there any plans to include associations with an API request? Currently I am pulling deals with this API; however, in order to obtain associated contacts for each of those deals I need to make thousands of API calls…  Here is a forum where others have requested the same functionality: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Get-associations-with-deals-from-crm-objects-deals-search/m-p/321104>
You can pull in associated contacts for deals, but if you wanted to do this with every deal it would be best to use graphql
Another request regarding this API would be to increase the total return limit from 10k to something a bit higher, maybe 15k or 20k total records…
<@U01QVR44MEY> that would be a work around only for accounts that are professional or enterprise
Very true, there's talk about bring the functionality to lower level accounts
that would be amazing if it does happen, do you know where i can look for updates regarding that?
<@U01QVR44MEY> <@U048K0YPPN1> would you mind filing and ideas forum post on binging GraphQL to other hubs and lower tiers?
especially for things like dev test accounts
